description: Gets all details of the groups associated with the Databricks account.

filter.description: Query by which the results have to be filtered. Supported operators are equals(

ne.description: ). Additionally, simple expressions can be formed using logical operators -

or.description: Group whose displayName contains foo and displayName contains bar.

attributes.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to return in response.

excludedAttributes.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude in response.

startIndex.description: Specifies the index of the first result. First item is number 1.

count.description: Desired number of results per page. Default is 10000.

ascending | descending.description: The order to sort the results.

totalResults.description: Total results that match the request filters.

1.description: Starting index of all the results that matched the request filters. First item is number 1.

itemsPerPage.description: Total results returned in the response.

displayName.description: String that represents a human-readable group name

roles.description: Indicates if the group has the admin role.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.
